channel.title: 711 loading 729 looking for staff join now
channel.description:
WORKING SQUEEL OF FORTUNE PERFECT!
Play on the webclient http://www.web-nexus.tk
Or simply use our desktop client http://www.nexus729.tk
Why not visit our forums? http://www.nexus718.smfnew.com
Information about the server: Nexus is a 718 loading 729 Rsps, this is a economy server with pvm/pvp and fun! The main owners are Death [Coder/Developer] and Diablo [Hoster/Main Owner]. The staff spot is currently open, so if you want to apply meet in-game!
Being a donator:
Become a donator today and get access to amazing features! For instance, you can use aura's, they all work! The wisdom aura gives you 2x XP Rate if you're a normal donator. If you're a Extreme Donator you'll get 3x EXP Rate, which is amazingly fast! That's not it! There are allot more features, come in-game and you'll see!
Join Today
Full Godwars -Bandos -Kree'ara -Saradomin -Zamorak Dicing -Horse dicing -Seal dicing -Flower game All Caves -Forinth cave (revenants working with drops!) -Falador cave -More, cannot remember Duel Arena Agility -Wilderness agility -Gnome agility -Feldip Hills Tormented demons -Now fixed prayer! Barrows -Fixed chest loot! Dominion Tower -Working prizes! -Fixed Corporal Beast Fight Pits Fight Kiln -Currently being worked on, almost done! Fight Caves -Working all waves! Queen Black Dragon -Fully working, fixed some bugs! Trivia -Custom minigame Castle Wars -Fully working, c Clan Wars -Dangerous and safe working, even the purple portal now! Kalphite Queen -Fixed drop rate Jadinko's -Added cave and npc's + bonusses and drops! Glacors -Now dropping faster dragon boots, but a bit more attack bonus! All 23/24 Skills working -Dungeoneering is being worked on, it is going to be released very soon!
This is not everything, we are a amazing economy based server with allot of shops!
Admin spot and moderator spot is currently open, also looking for good advertisers so we can get more players and have more fun!
Play on the webclient http://www.web-nexus.tk
Or simply use our desktop client http://www.nexus729.tk
Why not visit our forums? http://www.nexus718.smfnew.com
mod:open
